radios.title: Mini FM 107.1
radios.profile_slogan: We're down here for your soul

radio_info.short: MINI FM (107.1 MHz) is one of the oldest in Ilia. Founded in 1991 by George Panagopoulos and motivated by love for folk and traditional
radio_info.rest: songs of our land. Both the primary and the rock, are expressions of tradition, talking about very basic things and there just meet. With a program that starts from the famous Crossroads of Robert Johnson and reaches the electrical clearance Neil Young, the MINI FM pours from the airwaves completely upgraded facilities and above all the thirst for sharing, soul and essence of music.
